snippet: Smartphones running Google's Android operating system outsell iPhones more than two to one. But as Nick Wingfield and Brian X. Chen report in Monday's New York Times, Apple has held onto one critical advantage even as Google's system has surged: the...
abstract: Smartphones running Google's Android operating system outsell iPhones more than two to one. But as Nick Wingfield and Brian X. Chen report in Monday's New York Times, Apple has held onto one critical advantage even as Google's system has surged: the loyalty of mobile app developers.

headline.main: Daily Report: App Developers Stick With Apple
